Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

Hi Marc! Also please do next things:
After some thinking I want you to:
1. File a bug in LP and not add this info in commit message (follow https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/GitCommitMessages)
2. Update unit tests here: https://github.com/openstack/glance/blob/master/glance/tests/unit/test_glance_replicator.py
3. Update pep8 to make the gate pass.
Thanks in advance :)
Uploaded patch set 2.
